# asis_chunk

R package: Insert asis code chunk in R Markdown. Addin for RStudio.  

Inserts:  

> 
> ´´´{asis}
> 
> ´´´
> 

By Enrico Manlapig
Contact at:  
emanlapig@westmont.edu


Main functions:   

* asis_chunk  

## Installation  
Development version:  

> install.packages("devtools")
>
> devtools::install_github("EnricoManlapig/asischunk")  

## Use

* Install package
* Add key command (e.g. mac: cmd-alt-shift-i, win: ctrl-alt-shift-i) by going to:   
    - *Tools* > *Addins* > *Browse Addins* > *Keyboard Shortcuts*.  
    - Find **asis code chunk** and press its field under *Shortcut*. 
    - Press desired key command.
    - Press *Apply*.
    - Press *Execute*.
* Press chosen key command inside an R Markdown code chunk.
